userdoc.notice: RLPReader is a library for parsing RLP-encoded byte arrays into Solidity types. Adapted         from Solidity-RLP (https://github.com/hamdiallam/Solidity-RLP) by Hamdi Allam with         various tweaks to improve readability.

documentation.text: @notice Max list length that this library will accept.
